name: Ball Chaos
description:
Prototype of an idea I had. This is heavily (heavily) inspired by Lethal League Blaze, you should check it out, it's pretty nice!

Controls:

Left and right arrows keys to move
Space bar to jump
Double jump
Hold spacebar to jump higher, and tap it to jump lower
Hold shift to sprint

X to bunt the ball - bunting stops the ball
C to hit the ball

Hold left or right while in the air and press C to spike

If the ball is fast enough and you catch it with a bunt, a sick animation will play
